crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'webhook' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc._id], {'id': doc._id, 'hook': doc.hook, 'name':doc.name}); }

accounts_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'webhook' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_account_id, null); }

attempts_by_hook_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'webhook_attempt' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc.hook_id, doc.pvt_created], null); }

attempts_by_time_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'webhook_attempt' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc.pvt_created], null); }
